name: 2. ClickUp Stage = "Interviewing 1" -> Send Email Inviting Candidate to Interview

variables.name: emailHtml
variables.value:
Hi {{2.custom_fields.`First Name`}},

Our team loved your video & the rest of your application. We'd love to extend an invitation to learn a little more about you over a call.

If this is still something you're interested in, please book a meeting with our manager Nick using this link: Nick's calendar.

We look forward to meeting you. Let us know here if you have any questions—thanks!

Best wishes,
1SecondCopy Team

mapper.subject: Congratulations {{2.custom_fields.First}}! We'd like to have you for an interview.
